content.text: Hello, my name is participant_1. I am from California and I am a student.
Hi, I am participant_2. I wish I could write in cursive. I enjoy cold winters and strong breezes. I listen to a lot of strange music. I wish I could live in Iceland.
It's nice to meet you, participant_1. I like to shop at Goodwill. I think recycling is important.
It's nice to meet you too, participant_2. I like to wait for something interesting to happen each day.
What's your favorite thing about cold weather?
I love the feeling of the wind on my face and the smell of the snow.
I love that too! I also love the way the snow makes everything look so clean and peaceful.
Me too! I also love going sledding and building snowmen.
Me too! I love spending time in the snow with my family and friends.
I'm glad we have so much in common!
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
